sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Footer from "../../Footer" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import Loading from "../../Loading/Loading"; const EventDetail = (props) => { const param = useParams(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) console.log("param", param) const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const getProductDetail = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const respone = await fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${param.id}`); const data = await respone.json(); setProduct(data) setLoading(false) } catch (error) { setLoading(false) console.log(error) } } useEffect(() => { getProductDetail(); }, []); if (loading) { return ( ) } return ( <>

{product.title}

The Desk Flagship - Daun Penh

About Event

Date

From 11 Sep - 12 rd Oct 2022

Start Time

9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Event Locaton

Description

{product.description}

What we offer

Free lunch
JCI merchandise
Free lunch
Free lunch

Event host by

Techo Startup Center

We are a membership-based nonprofit organization of 200,000 young people ages 18 to 40 in 5,000 communities and more than 100 countries around the world.

View Profile
Price
${product.price} / Per Ticket
Quantity
) } export default EventDetail;
